item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact lmg_bit@163.com ​ I love hearing from people, so please email me at lmg_bit@163.com and introduce yourself. ​ Why? For two reasons: ​ I love getting to know people around the world. (Many of my best friends and even great loves are people who I met when they emailed to introduce themselves.) ​ Because I know a lot of people, I can help connect you with someone you should meet.

item.title: Now
item.description: What I’m doing now Focusing Well, that’s the meta-answer. There are times in my life when my head is up, looking around. And times when my head is down. Right now I’m completely head-down and focused. Not even reading. Just programming and writing every hour I’m awake. All work. No play. Except when I’m with my son.

item.title: How to change or build your career
item.description: I get emails from many people wanting to change or build their career. I always recommend the best book on the subject: “So Good They Can’t Ignore You” by Cal Newport. Here are a few of its best points: Forget passion and purpose ​ Forget “follow your passion” or “find your true calling”. Stop thinking like that. Here’s why: ​ Words like “passion” and “purpose” are dangerous because they sound huge and romantic.
